title: How do I stop messages app from removing SMS messages. I need the all of them on my phone.
content:
My new Pixel 3XL is deleting text messages after a certain time. I need to turn it off and keep the full history on my phone. I am desperate for help because I need them for court case.
Thanks in advance for any help you can offer.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
